info.name: Protonmail Beta clean
info.description:
Resized some things, moved other thing a little, painted some icons for ease of use.
Also having Open Sans font installed on your machine will make it look way nicer.
info.additionalInfo:
2020-5-15 - painted Spam icon orange,
2020-10-14 - PM removed unnecessary crap themselves, thanks PM. Updated code to reflect new html elements data-naming, removed some other unnecessary styling code
